index.doc:
# cldoc documentation example
This documentation example shows many of the features of [cldoc](http://jessevdk.github.com/cldoc) and provides a complete working example of how to document your code and generate a website using [cldoc](http://jessevdk.github.com/cldoc).
The source for this example can be found in the [cldoc repository](https://github.com/jessevdk/cldoc/tree/master/example) on github.
